attributes.action: Do not cut the foreign aid budget below 0.7%.
attributes.additional_details: Government foreign aid helps those in need, in a way that is often more efficient than non-governmental charities. Even if giving to those less fortunate was not an ethical necessity, a more stable world leads to better conditions for everyone.
attributes.background: The government is considering cutting the Foreign Aid budget below the 0.7% minimum set out in law. We want this stopped.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561068
